name: BUSINESSBECAUSE
tag_list: niche-network, online-media, business-school, mba, mba-jobs, mba-admissions, mba-careers, mba-entrepreneurs, international-networking
overview:
BUSINESSBECAUSE LTD is an online media company providing marketing, communications and careers services to universities/ schools and corporate recruiters around the world.

Our flagship product, BusinessBecause.com, is a free network connecting people before, during and after their MBA. On BusinessBecause members can read daily journalism about the b-school world and MBA job market, connect with other business students internationally, message employers, build an online resume, apply for jobs and publish stories.

Launched out of London, UK by an all-female team in late 2009, BusinessBecause is a self-funded, debt-free start-up. Over two years BusinessBecause.com has built a solid base of readers (75,000 monthly visitors) and registered members (15,000) and is growing steadily, particularly in Europe and Asia. This ‘niche network’ facilitates useful connections between b-school applicants, business schools, current MBAs, alumni and employers.

BusinessBecause partners with a wide range of international business schools including INSEAD (France), IE (Spain), Manchester (UK), CEIBS (China), AGSM (Australia) and Nanyang (Singapore).
